title: The Importance of Financial Education
content: For release on delivery  8:30 a.m. EDT  April 8, 2010          The Importance of Financial Education    Remarks by   Elizabeth A. Duke   Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at the    Jump$tart Coalition   Investing in Our Future:  Financial Education and Washington Event   Washington, D.C.    April 8, 2010
